name: PicPuzzle
tagline: Simple AI Aided Sliding Puzzle Game
body:
It is a plain Sliding Puzzle game, but the interesting part is- it includes an Artificial Intelligent that can arrange the pieces for you. It also keeps record of the top 5 fastest slovers. ### Views
